markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 7" pfs="Limited">
[Return to Essence](/Spells.aspx?ID=1087)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Strength of Thousands</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #173: Doorway to the Red Star](/Sources.aspx?ID=103) pg. 77

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 120 feet

**Target** one magically sealed or warded doorway or chest
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You unravel the magic of a spell that affects a container, door, or lock, converting it into energy you can repurpose to power your own spells. Attempt a [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) check against the target spell or magical effect that wards or seals a doorway or chest, such as [_lock_](/Spells.aspx?ID=174), or against a spell or effect that deals damage or delivers secondary effects when it's opened, such as [_glyph of warding_](/Spells.aspx?ID=138). If you succeed, you recover its energy, restoring one of your expended spell slots of 3rd level or lower.

---
**Heightened (8th)** You can restore an expended spell slot of 4th level or lower.

**Heightened (9th)** You can restore an expended spell slot of 5th level or lower.

**Heightened (10th)** You can restore an expended spell slot of 6th level or lower.
name: Return to Essence
primary_source: Pathfinder #173: Doorway to the Red Star
primary_source_raw: Pathfinder #173: Doorway to the Red Star pg. 77
